input.job_description:
Personal Summary  
An MBA educated High performing and 
strategic thinking professional with three 
years of diversified experience in Business 
and Financ ial Analytics, S ales Support and 
Client M anagement  with exposure to 
national, international, and multicultural 
organizations  
 
Well versed in using various business 
intelligence soft ware . A data scientist in the 
making.  I am adaptable, innovative leader 
committed to honesty, transparency and 
improvement of  processes  
 
Contact  
Address: 208 A -1 Tufail Road, Lahore Cantt  
Phone: +92-345-4536653  
Email:  ahmad.noorudin@yahoo.com  
Date of Birth:  28-Aug-1994  
 
Linkedin Profile:  
linkedin.com/in/ahmad -noor -ud-din-
02934391  
 
 
Skills Highlight  
 
 Microsoft Excel   Microsoft Visio  
 Microsoft Access   Microsoft Project  
 Microsoft PP  Corel Draw  
 Microsoft Word   Power BI  
 Adobe Photoshop   Tableau  
 Adobe Illustrator   Python  
 Adobe Premier   SQL 
 Digital Marketing   Account Mgt.  
 
Professional  Experience  
MCB Bank Limited – (October 2018 – Present ) 
Sr. Manager  - Projects Implementation , Retail Banking Group  
 Main point of contact for all ongoing projects  at a group level.  
 Provide project updates on a consistent basis to various stakeholders about strategy, 
adjustments, and progress . 
 Develop and manage a detailed proj ect schedule and work plan . 
 Utilize industry best prac tices, techniques, &  standards throughout project execution  
 Determine and define project scope and objectives . 
 Measure project performance to identify areas for improvement  
Manager - Business Intelligence Unit (BIU), Retail Banking Group  
 Sales Coordination – Managing a sales force of 500+ Relationship Managers . 
 Financial Modeling and Budgeting – Creating yearly budgets for business areas . 
 Monitoring and Evaluating performance against assigned budgets periodically.  
 Strategy Development – Creating business growth strategies . 
 Data Analytics and MIS development for business (Excel, Power BI, SQL, Tableau) . 
 Creating campaigns to increa se business performance.  
 Develop reports, system modules  and conduct UAT . 
 
Uber Technologies – (January 2017 – August 2017)  
Greenlight Expert - II, Operations  
 Partner Driver Coordination - Resolving day to day problems faced.  
 Training and Onboarding – Lead Trainer for existing  and new partner drivers.  
 Redesigned and Improved the training process.  
 Creating campaigns to increase partner productivity through incentives schemes.  
 Integral part of the Launch Team for Islamabad and Gu jranwala  
 
Marksman Marketing Consultancy  – (July 2016 – January 2017)  
Intern – PMI (Trade Tracker),  Operations  
 Data analytics and Report Development for and performance dashboards and r eal-time 
data tracking (Excel and Power BI).  
 Client Coordination – Resolve problems an d provide the relevant reports.  
 Spearheaded the  Launch Team for the census and the merchandising project.  
 
FINCA Microfinance Bank Ltd  – (April 2016 – June 2016 ) 
Intern,  Marketing and Customer Experience  
 Worked on the Mission Monitor Project, ensuring compliance of FINCA guidelines and 
gain insights into the customers and their banking  experience.  
 
Bank Alfalah Ltd  – (July 2015 – September 2015 ) 
Project Intern,  Finance  
 Worked alongside the regional teams to gain insights into industry standards and 
position of Bank Alfalah Limited vs the industry.  
 
Education  
Masters of Business Administration (MBA)  – (2017 – 2018)  
General - (Finance and Marketing)  
Lahore School of Economics  - (CGPA 3.27)  
Bachelors in Business Administration (BBA - Honors)  – (2012  – 2016 ) 
Double Majors - (Finance and Marketing)  
Lahore School of Economics - (CGPA 3.48)  
O and A Levels  (Engineering ) – (2007  – 2012 ) 
Aitchison College Lahore  
 
Certifications  
Social Media Marketing:  Google AdWords and Analytics Certified  
 
Additional Experience  
Digital Marketing Head,  Noor’s Party and Event Plan ning – (September 2015 – Present)  
Volunteer (Rahbar) , The Citizens Foundation Pakistan – (September 2019 – November 2019)  
Society President,  Aitchison College Computing Society – (August 2011 – July 2012)  Ahmad Noor -ud- Din
input.additional_info: Preferred universities include National University of Computer and Emerging Sciences in Pakistan and equivalent institutions. We offer relocation support for candidates based outside of the hiring city, subject to management approval. Skills are assessed through a combination of technical tests, project management case studies, and panel interviews consisting of departmental heads and HR representatives.
minimum_requirements: Experience in managing enterprise data warehouse projects
